; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations CGR <Retail.Operations.CGR@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE CLOSURE | GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the last trading date of GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall  will be on 12th December 2024 at 11:00 PM and store will be handed over to demolition contractor on 15th December 2024.

 

The hoarding installation will commence on 12th December after mall trading/operating hours.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks prior our handover to the mall. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me any time.

 

Best regards,

Retail Operations UAE

Mohamed Bata 050 8158 454.


--------------------------------------------------
ID: C16PKAR_01
From: Mohamed BATA <Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>

chalhoub.com> >; Retail Operations CGR <Retail.Operations.CGR@chalhoub.com <mailto:Retail.Operations.CGR@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE CLOSURE | GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the last trading date of GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall  will be on 12th December 2024 at 11:00 PM and store will be handed over to demolition contractor on 15th December 2024.

 

The hoarding installation will commence on 12th December after mall trading/operating hours.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks prior our handover to the mall. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me any time.

 

Best regards,

Retail Operations UAE

Mohamed Bata 050 8158 454.


--------------------------------------------------

Subject: RSO UAE - STORE CLOSURE | GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the last trading date of GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall  will be on 12th December 2024 at 11:00 PM and store will be handed over to demolition contractor on 15th December 2024.

 

The hoarding installation will commence on 12th December after mall trading/operating hours.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks prior our handover to the mall. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me any time.

 

Best regards,

Retail Operations UAE

Mohamed Bata 050 8158 454.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Friday, November 8, 2024 2:25 PM
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE CLOSURE | GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the last trading date of GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall  will be on 12th December 2024 at 11:00 PM and store will be handed over to demolition contractor on 15th December 2024.

 

The hoarding installation will commence on 12th December after mall trading/operating hours.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks prior our handover to the mall. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me any time.

 

Best regards,

Retail Operations UAE

Mohamed Bata 050 8158 454.

Good morning,

 

Please be reminded of GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall closure timeline to ensure smooth processes and surrender to the mall on time.

*	@May Aung <mailto:May.Aung@chalhoub.com>  manual invoice books and credit card machines to be sent to account department, HO1 attention @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> .
*	@Fawzia Isse <mailto:Fawzia.Isse@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure water dispenser and water bottles collection takes place on 14th December.
*	@Jayesh Jayadevan <mailto:Jayesh.Jayadevan@chalhoub.com>  @Faisal Abdukunju <mailto:Faisal.Abdukunju@chalhoub.com>  @Joseph Diaz <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  please arrange IT equipment dismantle and collection in coordination with @May Aung <mailto:May.Aung@chalhoub.com>  maximum by 14th December.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Friday, November 8, 2024 2:25 PM
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE CLOSURE | GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the last trading date of GUESS Jeans Al Wahda Mall  will be on 12th December 2024 at 11:00 PM and store will be handed over to demolition contractor on 15th December 2024.

 

The hoarding installation will commence on 12th December after mall trading/operating hours.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks prior our handover to the mall. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me any time.

 

Best regards,

Retail Operations UAE

Mohamed Bata 050 8158 454.
